snippet: Senator Tom Harkin’s bill would dismantle the provisions of the Bush-era law that used standardized test scores to label tens of thousands of public schools as failing.
lead_paragraph: Senator Tom Harkin’s bill would dismantle the provisions of the Bush-era law that used standardized test scores to label tens of thousands of public schools as failing.

headline.main: Bill Would Overhaul No Child Left Behind
headline.print_headline: Bill Would Overhaul No Child Left Behind
headline.seo: Senator Harkin’s Bill Would Revamp No Child Left Behind Law
